p: Severe cases, on the other hand, seem to have disrupted immune responses. Several early case reports have demonstrated the presence of cytokines release storms, which demonstrate the presence of severe inflammatory responses in these patients characterised by increased interleukin (IL)-2, IL-7, granulocyte-colony stimulating factor, interferon-γ inducible protein 10, monocyte chemoattractant protein 1, macrophage inflammatory protein 1-α, and tumor necrosis factor-α.6 ( Mehta et al., 2020).
